name: I WANNA BE RIVETED
description:
Old Man Rivet and the Rivetheads
Live at the Allan Stone Gallery
opening of the Richard Minsky exhibition
May 5, 1981

From the lost cassette tape from 1981 that surfaced and was digitized in 2020. You can read the saga and more information about this work at
https://www.minsky.com/riveted.htm
